ai-patthana22.18:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.18:1.1_0: No cause is a reason for the result of deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:1.1_1: Nor causes a reason for the sake of results of deeds that causes unskillful qualities to arise.
ai-patthana22.18:1.1_2: There are no results of deeds that give rise to the result of deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:2.1_0: No cause is a reason for the result of past deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:2.1_1: There are neither liable to cause nor condition for the sake of deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:3.1_0: The result of deeds doesn’t give rise to the result of past deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:3.1_1: Because of the results of deeds caused by the result of past deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:4.1_0: Nor does cause or reason for the sake of results of deeds by which that causes unskillful qualities to arise because of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana22.18:5.1_0: Nor does the result of deeds cause or condition for the result of deeds.
ai-patthana22.18:6.1_0: Nor does the result of deeds ...
ai-patthana22.18:6.1_1: Nor does cause two things to cause or reasons.
ai-patthana22.18:6.1_4: and the five results of deeds ...
ai-patthana22.18:7.1_0: Nor does cause the reason for the sake of results of deeds by causes and conditions.
